Reviews.Title: Shipped with European power adapter and wouldn't connect.
Reviews.Author: Choco "booboo"
Reviews.Content: Was shipped with a European power adapter, and after finding a replacement, it wouldn't connect... Tried so many different ways, and no dice... Oh well... I think I received a refurbished one, because my friend had no problem connecting his--and he asks me for computer help.

ProductInfo.Features:
Watch & listen from anywhere
Perfect for Homes Offices Pets & Babies
Access from anywhere in the world
Mounts to wall or ceiling
Pivots on magnetic base
